items.title: Polycab India promoters offload 1.5% stake to clutch of investors for Rs 1,740 crore
items.description: Polycab India shares fell 1.66 percent to Rs 7,407.5 on Thursday, extending losses for third consecutive session especially after hitting record high on Monday this week.

items.title: Live: Nifty extends loss to fifth day, slips below 25,000-mark | Closing Bell
items.description: Sensex Slips Over 350 Pts On Monthly Expiry. Nifty Tumbles Below 25,000; India Vix Rises 3%. Broader Markets Extend Losses To 4th Day. Auto Stocks Continue To See Profit-booking. Visa Fee Hike News Continue To Haunt IT Sector. Metals, Financials Hold Fort In A Tepid Market. FMCG Stocks Succumb To Selling Pressure. Catch Lovisha Darad and Yatin Mota in conversation with Nirav Harish Chheda, Assistant Vice President, Equity Derivatives & Technical Research- Retail, Nirmal Bang and Gaurang H Shah, Sr. Vice President, Geojit Financial service Ltd
